keyword_upload: (?i)\b(upload|shangchuan|上传|上傳|file_upload|文件上传|檔案上傳)[\W_].{0,44}
keyword_download: (?i)\b(download|xiazai|下载|下載|file_download|文件下载|檔案下載)[\W_].{0,44}
keyword_reset: (?i)\b(reset|重置|重設|reset_password|找回密码|忘记密码)[\W_].{0,44}
keyword_exec: (?i)\b(exec|execute|eval|shell|cmd|命令执行|命令執行|反弹shell|反彈shell)[\W_].{0,44}
